DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Intra-Abdominal Fat Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Using Non-Invasive Method
DOC.criteria: Established type 2 diabetes Age 18 80 Body mass index ( BMI ) 2045 Kg/m2 . Willing undergo laboratory anthropometric assessment .
